parameters.name: filter[date_from]
parameters.description: Filters results to only include moves on and after the given date, e.g. `2019-05-02`

parameters.name: filter[date_to]
parameters.description: Filters results to only include moves up to and including the given date, e.g. `2019-05-09`

parameters.name: filter[status]
parameters.description: Filters results to only include moves with the given status

parameters.name: filter[from_location_id]
parameters.description: Filters results to only include moves from the given location

parameters.name: filter[to_location_id]
parameters.description: Filters results to only include moves to the given location
